attributes.action: Stop profiteering of private travel testing companies
attributes.additional_details: The government is allowing private firms for profiting from a pandemic and this morally unjust
attributes.background:
Travel tests to be purchased at an affordable price only from NHS
Profits to go to NHS instead of privately owned companies

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to buy Covid-19 tests from private providers are a matter for individual consumers, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase regulation of covid-19 testing by private companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593541

Permit the use of NHS Covid-19 lateral flow tests for international travel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599247
